headline: GTA Online
subtitle: FIRST DOSE
content:
If you’ve ever met a face-paint splattered, tweaked-out misunderstood genius blasting Fatal Incursion in the park at 1pm, you’ve probably met a Fooligan. And if you haven’t, get ready to see the American underbelly’s new tribal tattoo.

Word is they’re looking to set up shop in Blaine County. But if you want a place at the table in San Andreas, you better be ready to fight for it. Watch out for a call from Ron.

First Dose, the opening chapter of a two-part story, is now available.
